titles: The history of the creation as it is written by Moses in the first and second chapters of Genesis : plainly opened and expounded in severall sermons preached in London : whereunto is added a short treatise of Gods actuall Providence in ruling, ordering, and governing the world and all things therein / by G.W.
author: Walker, George, 1581?-1651.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
